Test if an object is on the path.

Source: R/path.r
on_path.Rd

Test if an object is on the path.

on_path(...)

Arguments

...

Strings indicating the executables to check for on the path.

See also

Other path: path

Examples

on_path("R")
#> [1] TRUE
on_path("gcc")
#> [1] TRUE
on_path("foo", "bar")  # FALSE in most cases
#> [1] FALSE FALSE
withr::with_path(tempdir(), on_path("gcc"))
#> [1] TRUE
